responses.problem_statement: Students struggle to stay focused during online classes
responses.interview_question_1: What makes it hard to focus in online classes?
responses.interview_question_2: What would help you stay engaged?
responses.interview_question_3: How do you currently manage distractions?
responses.user_description: Tech-savvy high school student who takes 6 online classes daily
responses.sad_space_current: Constant notifications, no dedicated study space, eye strain from screens
responses.happy_space_ideal: Quiet environment, ergonomic desk, gamified learning system
responses.product_statement: My product will help high school students stay focused during online classes by providing distraction-blocking features and engagement rewards
responses.idea_1: Browser extension that blocks social media during class
responses.idea_2: AI study buddy that tracks attention and gives breaks
responses.idea_4: Virtual study room with peer accountability
responses.best_idea: AI study buddy with distraction blocking and break reminders
responses.validation_criteria: Increases focus time by 40%, reduces distractions by 60%, positive user feedback from 80% of testers
responses.prototype_description: Mobile app with AI attention tracking, smart break scheduler, and achievement system
responses.innovation_tech: Machine learning for attention detection, cross-platform sync
responses.innovation_market: Targeting 50M online students globally, freemium model
responses.final_reflection: This journey taught me to focus on real user problems instead of technology first
